BamData.description: Binary Alignment Map (BAM) is the comprehensive raw data of genome sequencing; it consists of the lossless, compressed binary representation of the Sequence Alignment Map-files.

extractJunction.description: Determine whether to extract exon-to-exon junctions. __Default__: `false`

indexUrl.description: URL link to the index file of the BAM file

junctionMinCoverage.description: Determine the threshold of coverage when extracting exon-to-exon junctions. __Default__: `1`

loadMates.description: Load mates that are located in the same chromosome. __Default__: `false`

maxInsertSize.description: Determines the threshold of insert sizes for determining the structural variants. __Default__: `5000`

url.description: URL link to the BAM data file

customFields.description: An array of strings, where each string is the name of a non-standard field in the BED file. If there are `n` custom fields, we assume that the last `n` columns of the BED file correspond to the custom fields.

indexUrl.description: Specify the URL address of the data file index.

sampleLength.description:
Specify the number of rows loaded from the URL.

__Default:__ `1000`

url.description: Specify the URL address of the data file.

BeddbData.description: Regular BED or similar files can be pre-aggregated for the scalable data exploration. Find our more about this format at [HiGlass Docs](https://docs.higlass.io/data_preparation.html#bed-files).

genomicFields.description: Specify the name of genomic data fields.

url.description: Specify the URL address of the data file.

valueFields.description: Specify the column indexes, field names, and field types.

aggregation.description: Determine aggregation function to apply within bins. __Default__: `"mean"`

binSize.description: Binning the genomic interval in tiles (unit size: 256).

column.description: Assign a field name of the middle position of genomic intervals. __Default__: `"position"`

end.description: Assign a field name of the end position of genomic intervals. __Default__: `"end"`

start.description: Assign a field name of the start position of genomic intervals. __Default__: `"start"`

url.description: Specify the URL address of the data file.

value.description: Assign a field name of quantitative values. __Default__: `"value"`
Assign a constant value for a visual channel.

range.description: Determine the colors that should be bound to data value. Default properties are determined considering the field type.

scaleOffset.description: Whether to use offset of the domain proportionally. This is bound to brushes on the color legend. __Default__: `[0, 1]`

groupField.description: The name of a nominal field to group rows by in prior to piling-up

CsvData.description: Any small enough tabular data files, such as tsv, csv, BED, BEDPE, and GFF, can be loaded using "csv" data specification.

chromosomeField.description: Specify the name of chromosome data fields.

chromosomePrefix.description: Specify the chromosome prefix if chromosomes are denoted using a prefix besides "chr" or a number

genomicFields.description: Specify the name of genomic data fields.

headerNames.description: Specify the names of data fields if a CSV file does not contain a header.

sampleLength.description:
Specify the number of rows loaded from the URL.

__Default:__ `1000`

url.description: Specify the URL address of the data file.

DataTrack.description: Partial specification of `BasicSingleTrack` to use default visual encoding predefined by data type.

assembly.description:
A string that specifies the genome builds to use. Currently support `"hg38"`, `"hg19"`, `"hg18"`, `"hg17"`, `"hg16"`, `"mm10"`, `"mm9"`, and `"unknown"`.

__Note:__: with `"unknown"` assembly, genomic axes do not show chrN: in labels.

centerRadius.description:
Proportion of the radius of the center white space.

__Default:__ `0.3`

endAngle.description: Specify the end angle (in the range of [0, 360]) of circular tracks (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

height.description: Specify the track height in pixels.

innerRadius.description: Specify the inner radius of tracks when (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

layout.description: Specify the layout type of all tracks.

outerRadius.description: Specify the outer radius of tracks when `{"layout": "circular"}`.

spacing.description:
The size of the gap (1) between tracks, (2) between views, and (3) of the origin of circular tracks. The effect of this property depends on where on the spec you specify the `spacing`.

In a linear layout, this value is used in pixels, while in a circular layout, this value is used relative to the height of the tracks or views.

startAngle.description: Specify the start angle (in the range of [0, 360]) of circular tracks (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

style.description: Define the [style](http://gosling-lang.org/docs/visual-channel#style-related-properties) of multive views. Will be overwritten by the style of children elements (e.g., view, track).

title.description: If defined, will show the textual label on the left-top corner of a track.

width.description: Specify the track width in pixels.

xDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic x-axis

xOffset.description: Specify the x offset of views in the unit of pixels

yDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic y-axis

yOffset.description: Specify the y offset of views in the unit of pixels

Datum.description: Values in the form of JSON.

endField.description: The name of a quantitative field that represents the end position.

groupField.description: The name of a nominal field to group rows by in prior to piling-up.

isPaddingBP.description: Whether to consider `padding` as the bp length.

padding.description: The padding around visual lements. Either px or bp

startField.description: The name of a quantitative field that represents the start position.

maxRows.description: Specify maximum rows to be generated (default has no limit).

method.description: A string that specifies the type of displacement.

chromosome.description: If specified, only showing a certain interval in a chromosome.

interval.description: Show a certain interval within entire chromosome

EventStyle.description: The styles defined here will be applied to the target marks of mouse events, such as a point mark after the user clicks on it.

arrange.description: Show event effects behind or in front of marks.

color.description: color of the marks when mouse events are triggered

opacity.description: opacity of the marks when mouse events are triggered

stroke.description: stroke color of the marks when mouse events are triggered

strokeWidth.description: stroke width of the marks when mouse events are triggered

GenomicLengthTransform.description: Calculate genomic length using two genomic fields

A string that specifies the genome builds to use. Currently support `"hg38"`, `"hg19"`, `"hg18"`, `"hg17"`, `"hg16"`, `"mm10"`, `"mm9"`, and `"unknown"`.

__Note:__: with `"unknown"` assembly, genomic axes do not show chrN: in labels.

Proportion of the radius of the center white space.

__Default:__ `0.3`

endAngle.description: Specify the end angle (in the range of [0, 360]) of circular tracks (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

performanceMode.description: Render visual marks with less smooth curves to increase rendering performance. Only supported for `elliptical` `linkStyle` `withinLink` currently.

height.description: Specify the track height in pixels.

innerRadius.description: Specify the inner radius of tracks when (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

layout.description: Specify the layout type of all tracks.

outerRadius.description: Specify the outer radius of tracks when `{"layout": "circular"}`.

responsiveSize.description: Determine whether to make the size of `GoslingComponent` bound to its parent element. __Default__: `false`

field.description: A filter is applied based on the values of the specified data field

include.description: Check whether the value includes a substring.

not.description:
when `{"not": true}`, apply a NOT logical operation to the filter.

__Default:__ `false`

JsonData.description: The JSON data format allows users to include data directly in the Gosling's JSON specification.

chromosomeField.description: Specify the name of chromosome data fields.

genomicFields.description: Specify the name of genomic data fields.

sampleLength.description:
Specify the number of rows loaded from the URL.

__Default:__ `1000`

values.description: Values in the form of JSON.

JsonParseTransform.description: Parse JSON Object Array and append vertically

baseGenomicField.description: Base genomic position when parsing relative position.

field.description: The field that contains the JSON object array.

newField.description: If specified, store transformed values in a new field.

binSize.description: Determine the number of nearby cells to aggregate. __Default__: `1`

column.description: The name of the first genomic field. __Default__: `x`

row.description: The name of the first genomic field. __Default__: `y`

url.description: URL link to the matrix data file

value.description: The name of the value field. __Default__: `value`

MouseEventsDeep.description: Options for determining mouse events in detail, e.g., turning on specific events only

enableMouseOverOnMultipleMarks.description: Determine whether all marks underneath the mouse point should be affected by mouse over. __Default__: `false`

groupMarksByField.description: Group marks using keys in a data field. This affects how a set of marks are highlighted/selected by interaction. __Default__: `undefined`

rangeSelect.description: Whether to send range selection events.

arrangement.description: Specify how multiple views are arranged.

assembly.description:
A string that specifies the genome builds to use. Currently support `"hg38"`, `"hg19"`, `"hg18"`, `"hg17"`, `"hg16"`, `"mm10"`, `"mm9"`, and `"unknown"`.

__Note:__: with `"unknown"` assembly, genomic axes do not show chrN: in labels.

__Default:__ `0.3`

layout.description: Specify the layout type of all tracks.

spacing.description:
The size of the gap (1) between tracks, (2) between views, and (3) of the origin of circular tracks. The effect of this property depends on where on the spec you specify the `spacing`.

In a linear layout, this value is used in pixels, while in a circular layout, this value is used relative to the height of the tracks or views.

xDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic x-axis

xOffset.description: Specify the x offset of views in the unit of pixels

yDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic y-axis

yOffset.description: Specify the y offset of views in the unit of pixels

MultivecData.description: Two-dimensional quantitative values, one axis for genomic coordinate and the other for different samples, can be converted into HiGlass' `"multivec"` data. For example, multiple BigWig files can be converted into a single multivec file. You can also convert sequence data (FASTA) into this format where rows will be different nucleotide bases (e.g., A, T, G, C) and quantitative values represent the frequency. Find out more about this format at [HiGlass Docs](https://docs.higlass.io/data_preparation.html#multivec-files).

aggregation.description: Determine aggregation function to apply within bins. __Default__: `"mean"`

binSize.description: Binning the genomic interval in tiles (unit size: 256).

column.description: Assign a field name of the middle position of genomic intervals. __Default__: `"position"`

end.description: Assign a field name of the end position of genomic intervals. __Default__: `"end"`

row.description: Assign a field name of samples. __Default__: `"category"`

start.description: Assign a field name of the start position of genomic intervals. __Default__: `"start"`

url.description: Specify the URL address of the data file.

value.description: Assign a field name of quantitative values. __Default__: `"value"`

field.description: A filter is applied based on the values of the specified data field

not.description:
when `{"not": true}`, apply a NOT logical operation to the filter.

__Default:__ `false`

oneOf.description: Check whether the value is an element in the provided list.

endAngle.description: Specify the end angle (in the range of [0, 360]) of circular tracks (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

performanceMode.description: Render visual marks with less smooth curves to increase rendering performance. Only supported for `elliptical` `linkStyle` `withinLink` currently.

height.description: Specify the track height in pixels.

innerRadius.description: Specify the inner radius of tracks when (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

layout.description: Specify the layout type of all tracks.

outerRadius.description: Specify the outer radius of tracks when `{"layout": "circular"}`.

spacing.description:
The size of the gap (1) between tracks, (2) between views, and (3) of the origin of circular tracks. The effect of this property depends on where on the spec you specify the `spacing`.

In a linear layout, this value is used in pixels, while in a circular layout, this value is used relative to the height of the tracks or views.

startAngle.description: Specify the start angle (in the range of [0, 360]) of circular tracks (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

style.description: Define the [style](http://gosling-lang.org/docs/visual-channel#style-related-properties) of multive views. Will be overwritten by the style of children elements (e.g., view, track).

title.description: If defined, will show the textual label on the left-top corner of a track.

width.description: Specify the track width in pixels.

xDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic x-axis

xOffset.description: Specify the x offset of views in the unit of pixels

yDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic y-axis

yOffset.description: Specify the y offset of views in the unit of pixels

field.description: A filter is applied based on the values of the specified data field

inRange.description: Check whether the value is in a number range.

not.description:
when `{"not": true}`, apply a NOT logical operation to the filter.

__Default:__ `false`

clip.description: Clip row when the actual y value exceeds the max value of the y scale. Used only for bar marks at the moment. __Default__: `true`

padding.description: Determines the size of inner white spaces on the top and bottom of individiual rows. __Default__: `0`

range.description: Determine the start and end position of rendering area of this track along vertical axis. __Default__: `[0, height]`

target.description: Does the condition applied to the visualization itself or its container? __Default__: `'self'`

threshold.description: Threshold in the unit of pixels.

style.description: Define the [style](http://gosling-lang.org/docs/visual-channel#style-related-properties) of multive views. Will be overwritten by the style of children elements (e.g., view, track).

xDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic x-axis

xOffset.description: Specify the x offset of views in the unit of pixels

yDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic y-axis

yOffset.description: Specify the y offset of views in the unit of pixels

legend.description: not supported: Whether to display legend. __Default__: `false`

conditionPadding.description:
Specify the buffer size (in pixel) of width or height when calculating the visibility.

__Default__: `0`

measure.description: Specify which aspect of the `target` will be compared to the `threshold`.

operation.description:
A string that specifies the logical operation to conduct between `threshold` and the `measure` of `target`. Support

- greater than : "greater-than", "gt", "GT"

- less than : "less-than", "lt", "LT"

- greater than or equal to : "greater-than-or-equal-to", "gtet", "GTET"

- less than or equal to : "less-than-or-equal-to", "ltet", "LTET"

target.description: Target specifies the object that you want to compare with the threshold.

transitionPadding.description:
Specify the buffer size (in pixel) of width or height for smooth transition.

__Default__: `0`

scaleOffset.description: Whether to use offset of the domain proportionally. This is bound to brushes on the color legend. __Default__: `[0, 1]`

align.description: Specify the alignment of marks. This property is currently only supported for `triangle` marks.

brush.description: Customize the style of the brush mark in the `rangeSelect` mouse event.

color.description: color of the marks when mouse events are triggered

opacity.description: opacity of the marks when mouse events are triggered

stroke.description: stroke color of the marks when mouse events are triggered

strokeWidth.description: stroke width of the marks when mouse events are triggered

dashed.description: Specify the pattern of dashes and gaps for `rule` marks.

dx.description: Offset the position of marks in x direction. This property is currently only supported for `text` marks

dy.description: Offset the position of marks in y direction. This property is currently only supported for `text` marks.

enableSmoothPath.description:
Whether to enable smooth paths when drawing curves.

__Default__: `false`

inlineLegend.description: Specify whether to show legend in a single horizontal line?

legendTitle.description: If defined, show legend title on the top or left

linePattern.description: Specify the pattern of dashes and gaps for `rule` marks.

linkConnectionType.description:
Specify the connetion type of `betweenLink` marks.

__Default__: `"corner"`

linkMinHeight.description: The minimum height of `withinLink` and `betweenLink` marks. Unit is a percentagle. __Default__: `0.5`

linkStyle.description: The style of `withinLink` and `betweenLink` marks. __Default__: `'circular'` `'elliptical'` will be used as a default option.

matrixExtent.description: Determine to show only one side of the diagonal in a HiGlass matrix. __Default__: `"full"`

mouseOver.description: Customize visual effects of `mouseOver` events on marks.

select.description: Customize visual effects of `rangeSelect` events on marks .

textAnchor.description: Specify the alignment of `text` marks to a given point.

textFontSize.description: Specify the font size of `text` marks. Can also be specified using the `size` channel option of `text` marks.

textFontWeight.description: Specify the font weight of `text` marks.

textStroke.description: Specify the stroke of `text` marks. Can also be specified using the `stroke` channel option of `text` marks.

textStrokeWidth.description: Specify the stroke width of `text` marks. Can also be specified using the `strokeWidth` channel option of `text` marks.

withinLinkVerticalLines.description: Whether to show vertical lines that connect to the baseline (axis) when `y` and `ye` are both used. __Default__: `false`

firstBp.description: Based on the BEDPE, infer SV types. SV types are specified as one of the following strings: DUP, TRA, DEL, t2tINV, h2hINV.

secondBp.description: Based on the BEDPE, infer SV types. SV types are specified as one of the following strings: DUP, TRA, DEL, t2tINV, h2hINV.

TemplateTrack.description: Template specification that will be internally converted into `SingleTrack` for rendering.

assembly.description:
A string that specifies the genome builds to use. Currently support `"hg38"`, `"hg19"`, `"hg18"`, `"hg17"`, `"hg16"`, `"mm10"`, `"mm9"`, and `"unknown"`.

__Note:__: with `"unknown"` assembly, genomic axes do not show chrN: in labels.

centerRadius.description:
Proportion of the radius of the center white space.

__Default:__ `0.3`

endAngle.description: Specify the end angle (in the range of [0, 360]) of circular tracks (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

height.description: Specify the track height in pixels.

innerRadius.description: Specify the inner radius of tracks when (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

layout.description: Specify the layout type of all tracks.

outerRadius.description: Specify the outer radius of tracks when `{"layout": "circular"}`.

spacing.description:
The size of the gap (1) between tracks, (2) between views, and (3) of the origin of circular tracks. The effect of this property depends on where on the spec you specify the `spacing`.

In a linear layout, this value is used in pixels, while in a circular layout, this value is used relative to the height of the tracks or views.

startAngle.description: Specify the start angle (in the range of [0, 360]) of circular tracks (`{"layout": "circular"}`).

style.description: Define the [style](http://gosling-lang.org/docs/visual-channel#style-related-properties) of multive views. Will be overwritten by the style of children elements (e.g., view, track).

title.description: If defined, will show the textual label on the left-top corner of a track.

width.description: Specify the track width in pixels.

xDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic x-axis

xOffset.description: Specify the x offset of views in the unit of pixels

yDomain.description: Specify the visible region of genomic y-axis

yOffset.description: Specify the y offset of views in the unit of pixels

alt.description: Name of the data field for showing in the tooltip. Will use the field name if not specified.

field.description: Specifiy a data field whose value will show in the tooltip.

indexUrl.description: URL link to the tabix index file

sampleLength.description: The maximum number of rows to be loaded from the URL. __Default:__ `1000`

url.description: URL link to the VCF file

VectorData.description: One-dimensional quantitative values along genomic position (e.g., bigwig) can be converted into HiGlass' `"vector"` format data. Find out more about this format at [HiGlass Docs](https://docs.higlass.io/data_preparation.html#bigwig-files).

aggregation.description: Determine aggregation function to apply within bins. __Default__: `"mean"`

binSize.description: Binning the genomic interval in tiles (unit size: 256).

column.description: Assign a field name of the middle position of genomic intervals. __Default__: `"position"`

end.description: Assign a field name of the end position of genomic intervals. __Default__: `"end"`

start.description: Assign a field name of the start position of genomic intervals. __Default__: `"start"`

url.description: Specify the URL address of the data file.

value.description: Assign a field name of quantitative values. __Default__: `"value"`

axis.description: Specify where should the axis be put

linkingId.description: Users need to assign a unique linkingId for [linking views](/docs/user-interaction#linking-views) and [Brushing and Linking](/docs/user-interaction#brushing-and-linking)

axis.description: Specify where should the axis be put

flip.description: Whether to flip the y-axis. This is done by inverting the `range` property. __Default__: `false`

linkingId.description: Users need to assign a unique linkingId for [linking views](/docs/user-interaction#linking-views) and [Brushing and Linking](/docs/user-interaction#brushing-and-linking)

zeroBaseline.description: Specify whether to use zero baseline. __Default__: `true`

conditionPadding.description:
Specify the buffer size (in pixel) of width or height when calculating the visibility.

__Default__: `0`

measure.description: Specify which aspect of the `target` will be compared to the `threshold`.

operation.description:
A string that specifies the logical operation to conduct between `threshold` and the `measure` of `target`. Support

- greater than : "greater-than", "gt", "GT"

- less than : "less-than", "lt", "LT"

- greater than or equal to : "greater-than-or-equal-to", "gtet", "GTET"

- less than or equal to : "less-than-or-equal-to", "ltet", "LTET"

target.description: Target specifies the object that you want to compare with the threshold.

threshold.description: Set a threshold in the unit of base pairs (bp)

transitionPadding.description:
Specify the buffer size (in pixel) of width or height for smooth transition.

__Default__: `0`
